languages.text: {n}Абеляр поднимает на вас взгляд, в котором плещется многолетняя усталость.{/n} "Дорога мне одна — подле вас, Лорд-капитан. Больше у меня ничего и не осталось, так что поверьте — буду служить вам сенешалем до последнего вздоха".

{n}Abelard looks up at you, a perennial weariness filling his gaze.{/n} "I have but one place to be, Lord Captain, and it is at your side. This is all I have left, so believe me, I will serve as your Seneschal for as long as I still draw breath."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр поднимает на вас взгляд, в котором плещется многолетняя усталость.{/n} "Дорога мне одна — подле вас, Лорд-капитан. Больше у меня ничего и не осталось, так что поверьте — буду служить вам сенешалем до последнего вздоха".

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard looks up at you, a perennial weariness filling his gaze.{/n} "I have but one place to be, Lord Captain, and it is at your side. This is all I have left, so believe me, I will serve as your Seneschal for as long as I still draw breath."

{n}Abelard looks up at you, a perennial weariness filling his gaze.{/n} "I have but one place to be, Lord Captain, and it is at your side. This is all I have left, so believe me, I will serve as your Seneschal for as long as I still draw breath."

{n}Abelard looks up at you, a perennial weariness filling his gaze.{/n} "I have but one place to be, Lord Captain, and it is at your side. This is all I have left, so believe me, I will serve as your Seneschal for as long as I still draw breath."

{n}Abelard looks up at you, a perennial weariness filling his gaze.{/n} "I have but one place to be, Lord Captain, and it is at your side. This is all I have left, so believe me, I will serve as your Seneschal for as long as I still draw breath."

{n}Abelard looks up at you, a perennial weariness filling his gaze.{/n} "I have but one place to be, Lord Captain, and it is at your side. This is all I have left, so believe me, I will serve as your Seneschal for as long as I still draw breath."

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德抬着头，看着你，目光中满是经年累月的疲惫。{/n}“我该去的地方只有一个，舰长大人，那就是您的身边。我只剩下这一个能去的地方了。因此，只要我还活着，我就会一直担任您的总领。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks up at you, a perennial weariness filling his gaze.{/n} "I have but one place to be, Lord Captain, and it is at your side. This is all I have left, so believe me, I will serve as your Seneschal for as long as I still draw breath."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德抬着头，看着你，目光中满是经年累月的疲惫。{/n}“我该去的地方只有一个，舰长大人，那就是您的身边。我只剩下这一个能去的地方了。因此，只要我还活着，我就会一直担任您的总领。”

languages.text: {n}Abelard alza la mirada hacia ti, con un cansancio perenne en sus ojos.{/n} «No hay más que un lugar en el que deba estar, Lord Capitán, y es a su lado. Esto es todo lo que tengo, de modo que créame cuando le digo que seguiré siendo su Senescal mientras mi corazón siga latiendo».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks up at you, a perennial weariness filling his gaze.{/n} "I have but one place to be, Lord Captain, and it is at your side. This is all I have left, so believe me, I will serve as your Seneschal for as long as I still draw breath."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard alza la mirada hacia ti, con un cansancio perenne en sus ojos.{/n} «No hay más que un lugar en el que deba estar, Lord Capitán, y es a su lado. Esto es todo lo que tengo, de modo que créame cuando le digo que seguiré siendo su Senescal mientras mi corazón siga latiendo».

languages.text: {n}アベラルドはあなたを見上げている。そのまなざしには疲労感が満ちていた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、我のたったひとつの居場所は、他のどこでもなく、あなた様のお傍でございます。これが我に残されたすべてであり、命がある限り、陛下の家令長としてお仕えする所存です。どうか信じてください」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks up at you, a perennial weariness filling his gaze.{/n} "I have but one place to be, Lord Captain, and it is at your side. This is all I have left, so believe me, I will serve as your Seneschal for as long as I still draw breath."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドはあなたを見上げている。そのまなざしには疲労感が満ちていた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、我のたったひとつの居場所は、他のどこでもなく、あなた様のお傍でございます。これが我に残されたすべてであり、命がある限り、陛下の家令長としてお仕えする所存です。どうか信じてください」

languages.text: {n}Abelard blickt zu dir auf. Eine ewige Erschöpfung liegt in seinem Blick.{/n} "Ich habe nur einen Platz, Lord Captain, nämlich an Eurer Seite. Das ist alles, was ich noch habe, also glaubt mir: Ich werde bis zu meinem letzten Atemzug als Euer Truchsess dienen."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks up at you, a perennial weariness filling his gaze.{/n} "I have but one place to be, Lord Captain, and it is at your side. This is all I have left, so believe me, I will serve as your Seneschal for as long as I still draw breath."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard blickt zu dir auf. Eine ewige Erschöpfung liegt in seinem Blick.{/n} "Ich habe nur einen Platz, Lord Captain, nämlich an Eurer Seite. Das ist alles, was ich noch habe, also glaubt mir: Ich werde bis zu meinem letzten Atemzug als Euer Truchsess dienen."

languages.text: {n}Abélard lève les yeux vers vous, le regard empreint de sa lassitude coutumière.{/n} « Il n'y a qu'une seule place pour moi dans ce monde, Votre Seigneurie, et elle est à vos côtés. C'est tout ce qu'il me reste, alors vous pouvez me croire, je vous servirai en tant que sénéchal jusqu'à mon dernier souffle. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks up at you, a perennial weariness filling his gaze.{/n} "I have but one place to be, Lord Captain, and it is at your side. This is all I have left, so believe me, I will serve as your Seneschal for as long as I still draw breath."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard lève les yeux vers vous, le regard empreint de sa lassitude coutumière.{/n} « Il n'y a qu'une seule place pour moi dans ce monde, Votre Seigneurie, et elle est à vos côtés. C'est tout ce qu'il me reste, alors vous pouvez me croire, je vous servirai en tant que sénéchal jusqu'à mon dernier souffle. »

languages.text: {n}Abelard; âdeta kadim bir ağaca ait, yorgun bakışlarla sana bakıyor.{/n} "Olabileceğim yalnızca tek bir yer var Lord Kaptan, o da sizin yanınız. Benim için yalnızca burası kaldı, dolayısıyla nefes aldığım sürece size Seneşal olarak hizmet vereceğim konusunda bana güvenebilirsiniz."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks up at you, a perennial weariness filling his gaze.{/n} "I have but one place to be, Lord Captain, and it is at your side. This is all I have left, so believe me, I will serve as your Seneschal for as long as I still draw breath."
